syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "background.windowBackgrounds": [
        "/home/avinas/backgrounds/**"
    ],
    "debug.onTaskErrors": "debugAnyway",
    "background.backgroundOpacity": [
        0.9,
        0.1,
        0.1,
        0.1
    ],
    "vscode-edge-devtools.webhint": false,
    "background.useInvertedOpacity": true,
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "bash",

    // ===== LLDB configuration overrides =====
    "lldb.executable": "/usr/bin/lldb-vscode",
    "lldb.launch.env": {
        "LD_LIBRARY_PATH": "/usr/lib"
    },
    "lldb.launch.terminal": "integrated",
    "lldb.consoleMode": "commands",
    "lldb.dereferencePointers": true,
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Turbo Colors",
    "background.enabled": true,
    "background.autoInstall": true,
    "php.executablePath": "/opt/lampp/bin/php",
    "jdk.telemetry.enabled": true,
    "jake.autoDetect": "on",
    "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
    "editor.suggestOnTriggerCharacters": false,
    "editor.suggest.snippetsPreventQuickSuggestions": true,
    "editor.acceptSuggestionOnCommitCharacter": false,
    "editor.inlineSuggest.edits.renderSideBySide": "never",
    "debug.console.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "on",
    "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.allowWhitespaceOnlyChanges": false,
    "github.copilot.renameSuggestions.triggerAutomatically": false,
    "github.copilot.chat.edits.suggestRelatedFilesForTests": false,
    "github.copilot.chat.edits.suggestRelatedFilesFromGitHistory": false,
    "vsintellicode.modify.editor.suggestSelection": "disabled",
    "github.copilot.enable": {
        "*": false
    },
    "workbench.preferredLightColorTheme": "Turbo Colors",
    "window.autoDetectColorScheme": true,
    "terminal.integrated.localEchoStyle": "dim",
    "workbench.preferredDarkColorTheme": "Turbo Colors",
    "workbench.editorAssociations": {
        "*.copilotmd": "vscode.markdown.preview.editor",
        "*.apk": "default"
    },
    "github.copilot.nextEditSuggestions.enabled": true,

 
}"}
